EV385-231960: Roof Replacement at Saskatchewan Penitentiary - C04

* Regions of Delivery: Prince Albert, Saskatchewan

**Contact Information**
-------------------

* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16448597?extsite=MTY0NDg1OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description**
-------------------

The Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking a contractor to demolish and replace the existing roof at the Prince Albert Institution of the Correctional Service of Canada in Prince Albert, Saskatchewan. The existing roof panels are asbestos transit panels, requiring a minimum level of abatement. The selected contractor will be responsible for the application and costs associated with all building permits and associated permits. Bids must be submitted by 2023-07-11 at 14:00:00
